bootstrap_layout.label: Bootstrap Layout
bootstrap_layout.comment:
Select bootstrap layout.
Important: No more fixed layout in ver 3.0.*.

active_responsive.label: Active Responsive
active_responsive.comment: Set to 'Yes', if you want to active responsive.

favicon.label: Favicon
favicon.comment: Allowed file types: ICO, PNG, GIF, JPG, JPEG, APNG, SVG. Not all browsers support all these formats!

icon_iphone_retina.label: Apple iPhone Retina Icon
icon_iphone_retina.comment: Icon for Apple iPhone Retina (114px X 114px)

icon_ipad_retina.label: Apple iPad Retian Icon
icon_ipad_retina.comment: Icon for Apple iPad Retina (144px X 144px)

banner_speed.label: Slideshow Speed
banner_speed.comment: Set the speed of the slideshow cycling, in milliseconds

hover_image.label: Hover Image Effect
hover_image.comment: Show other image on mouse hover over the main image.

image_order.label: Hover Image Order
image_order.comment: Select order of the hover image.

grid_addliks_inline.label: Show "Add to Cart", "Add to Compare", "Add to Wishlist" in one line

heading_addlinks.label: Add to Compare, Add to Wishlist

show_attributes.label: Default Attributes to Open
show_attributes.comment: Comma separated list of attribute codes.

ads_blocks.label: Advertising Blocks
ads_blocks.comment: Comma separated list of static block identifiers. These static blocks will be displayed as slides.

enable.label: Show Twitter Tweets
enable.comment: Set to 'Yes', if you want to show the twitter tweets.

enable.label: Show Facebook Like Box
enable.comment: Set to 'Yes', if you want to show a facebook like box.

font_family_group.label: Font Family
font_family_group.comment: Select predefined font stack, Google Fonts or type in your custom font stack.

font_family.label: Font Name
font_family.comment: Font preview is available on Google Web Fonts

heading_heading.label: H1, H2, H3, H4, H5, H6, Titles

heading_font_family_group.label: Heading Font Family
heading_font_family_group.comment: Select predefined font stack, Google Fonts or type in your custom font stack.

heading_font_family.label: Font Name
heading_font_family.comment: Font preview is available on Google Web Fonts

desc_font_family_group.label: Description Font Family
desc_font_family_group.comment: Select predefined font stack, Google Fonts or type in your custom font stack.

desc_font_family.label: Font Name
desc_font_family.comment: Font preview is available on Google Web Fonts

heading_input.label: Input Box, Text Area, Select Box, etc

bg_mode.label: Background Mode
bg_mode.comment: Select image mode or texture mode.

texture.label: Background Texture
texture.comment: If uploaded the background image, it will be ignore.

font_family_group.label: Font Family
font_family_group.comment: Select predefined font stack, Google Fonts or type in your custom font stack.

font_family.label: Font Name
font_family.comment: Font preview is available on Google Web Fonts

link_show_border.label: Show Border
link_show_border.comment: Set to 'Yes', if you want to show border in the sides.

popup_level1_font_family_group.label: Level1 Font Family
popup_level1_font_family_group.comment: Select predefined font stack, Google Fonts or type in your custom font stack.

popup_level1_font_family.label: Font Name
popup_level1_font_family.comment: Font preview is available on Google Web Fonts

font_family_group.label: Font Family
font_family_group.comment: Select predefined font stack, Google Fonts or type in your custom font stack.

font_family.label: Font Name
font_family.comment: Font preview is available on Google Web Fonts

title_font_family_group.label: Heading Font Family
title_font_family_group.comment: Select predefined font stack, Google Fonts or type in your custom font stack.

title_font_family.label: Font Name
title_font_family.comment: Font preview is available on Google Web Fonts

font_family_group.label: Font Family
font_family_group.comment: Select predefined font stack, Google Fonts or type in your custom font stack.

font_family.label: Font Name
font_family.comment: Font preview is available on Google Web Fonts

price_font_family_group.label: Font Family
price_font_family_group.comment: Select predefined font stack, Google Fonts or type in your custom font stack.

price_font_family.label: Font Name
price_font_family.comment: Font preview is available on Google Web Fonts

save_font_family_group.label: News, Save Salse Font Family
save_font_family_group.comment: Select predefined font stack, Google Fonts or type in your custom font stack.

save_font_family.label: Font Name
save_font_family.comment: Font preview is available on Google Web Fonts

name_font_family_group.label: Font Family
name_font_family_group.comment: Select predefined font stack, Google Fonts or type in your custom font stack.

name_font_family.label: Font Name
name_font_family.comment: Font preview is available on Google Web Fonts

heading_addto.label: Add to Links Buttons (Add to Compare, Add to Wishlist, etc.)

font_family_group.label: Font Family
font_family_group.comment: Select predefined font stack, Google Fonts or type in your custom font stack.

font_family.label: Font Name
font_family.comment: Font preview is available on Google Web Fonts

thick_bg_color1.label: Thick Background Color 1
thick_bg_color1.comment: Background color of compare table heading.

bg_mode.label: Background Mode
bg_mode.comment: Select image mode or texture mode.

texture.label: Background Texture
texture.comment: If uploaded the background image, it will be ignore.

theme_import.label: Import
theme_import.comment:
IMPORTANT:
XML files with all static blocks and pages can be found in the following directory: app/code/local/eternal/venedor/data/import/

overwrite_blocks.label: Overwrite Blocks
overwrite_blocks.comment: Set to 'Yes', if you want to overwrite blocks.

import_blocks.label: Static Blocks
import_blocks.comment: Click this button to import all static blocks provided with this theme.

overwrite_pages.label: Overwrite Pages
overwrite_pages.comment: Set to 'Yes', if you want to overwrite pages.

import_pages.label: Custom Pages
import_pages.comment: Click this button to import all pages provided with this theme.

import_theme.label: Theme Type
import_theme.comment: IMPORTANT: If you change theme type, please click 'Save Config' and then click "Import Theme Configuration".

import_settings.label: Theme Configuration
import_settings.comment:
Click this button to import all configuration.
IMPORTANT: If you change a theme type, please click 'Save Config' and then import.

theme_export.label: Export
theme_export.comment:
IMPORTANT:
XML files with all static blocks and pages can be found in the following directory: app/code/local/eternal/venedor/data/export/

export_blocks.label: Static Blocks
export_blocks.comment: Click this button to export all static blocks.

export_pages.label: Custom Pages
export_pages.comment: Click this button to export all pages.

export_settings.label: Theme Configuration
export_settings.comment: Click this button to export all configuration.
